Testimonials.text: "Being part of a multicultural team on a project that requires constant collaboration and understanding."
Testimonials.name: person 1

Testimonials.text: "Labs often sponsor or encourage members to attend and present at international AI conferences."
Testimonials.name: person 2

Testimonials.text: "Participating in events designed to share and celebrate different cultures, such as cooking classes."
Testimonials.name: person 3

Testimonials.text: "The lab excels in fostering innovation and learning. The dynamic team and expert guidance"
Testimonials.name: Person 1

Testimonials.text: "Working in small groups to test prototypes of AI applications, sometimes with partners from different countries."
Testimonials.name: person 5

Testimonials.text: " Attending workshops and lectures led by visiting professors and industry experts help us alot"
Testimonials.name: person 6
